bibl.title: Miscellaneous New Greek Papyri from Kellis.
Mélanges Jean Gascou. Textes et études papyrologiques (P.Gascou)

bibl.note: P. Kellis Gr. Inv. P93.60 + 71 recto = P. Gascou 67. Contract for irrigation work. 368. - Inv. P93.60 + 71verso = P. Gascou 68. Account of wheat and barley. After 368. - Inv. P96.108 = P. Gascou 69. Petition. C. 325-30 (?). - Inv. P00.21 = P. Gascou 70. Receipt. Between 304-24 (?). - Inv. P00.22.β = P. Gascou 71. Tax receipt. May/June 337. - Inv. P96.5 = P. Gascou 72. Order of payment. C. 340-5. - Inv. P97.5 = P. Gascou 73. Receipt for rent. Early 3rd c. - Inv. P97.8 = P. Gascou 74. Receipt for rent. 25 May 220. - Inv. P97.10 = P. Gascou 75. Fragment of a receipt. Early 3rd c. - Inv. P97.44 = P. Gascou 76. Fragment with a dating referring to Britain. 4th c. - Inv. P00.22.α = P. Gascou 77. Dating formula. 28-31 December 339. - Inv. P00.22.γ + P.97.5 = P. Gascou 78. Dating formula. 309. - Inv. P00.22.α = P. Gascou 79. Fragment of an administrative account. 4th c. - Inv. P96.49 = P. Gascou 80. Private letter. 4th c. - Inv. P96.32 = P. Gascou 81. Fragment of a letter. Early 4th c. - Inv. P97.30 = P. Gascou 82. Official correspondence. 4th c. - Inv. A/6/6 = P. Gascou 83. Perfume recipe. 4th c. - Inv. P93.24 = P. Gascou 84. Magical amulet. 4th c. - Inv. A/2/134 = P. Gascou 85. Magical amulet. 4th c. (?). - Inv. P93.24 = P. Gascou 86. Magical amulet. 4th c. (?). - Inv. P00.22.α = P. Gascou 87. Magical amulet. 4th c. (?). - Inv. P00.20 = P. Gascou 88. An enigmatic text. ? - Avec résumé en anglais.

Gascou 72; P96.32 = P. Gascou 81; P96.49 = P. Gascou 80; P96.108 = P. Gascou 69; P97.5 = P. Gascou 73; P97.8 = P. Gascou 74; P97.10 = P. Gascou 75; P97.30 = P. Gascou 82; P97.44 = P. Gascou 76
Klaas A. Worp, Miscellaneous New Greek Papyri from Kellis.
